permissions.title: Manage permissions
permissions.lastAdminWarning: This is currently the only admin. Demoting will remove all admin access.

doc.title: Permission management guide
doc.subtitle: Understand how to safely grant access

overview.title: How it works
overview.body: Each permission grants access to a specific capability. Use the search and group controls to review what a user can do.

points.one: Toggle checkboxes to mark permissions to add or remove.
points.two: Use group actions to grant or revoke an entire feature area in one click.
points.three: Save all changes to replace permissions or apply incremental updates for quick adjustments.

tips.title: Best practices
tips.body: Keep least-privilege in mind and review admin access regularly.

points.one: Promote a user to admin only when they require full platform control.
points.two: Use additions for temporary access and removals for urgent revocations.
points.three: Confirm destructive operations with the dialog prompts to avoid mistakes.

safety.title: Safety checks
safety.body: Demoting the last administrator will lock everyone out of admin tools. Always ensure at least one trusted admin remains.

clearAll.title: Remove all permissions?
clearAll.message: This will clear every permission for the user.

remove.title: Confirm removals
remove.message: The selected permissions will be removed immediately.

demote.title: Demote administrator
demote.message: The user will lose access to admin areas.

demoteLastAdmin.title: Demote the last admin?

tooltips.productCreate: Allows creating new products and publishing them to the catalog.
tooltips.productEdit: Allows editing product information, pricing, and variants.
tooltips.productDelete: Allows deleting products from the catalog.
tooltips.categoryEdit: Allows editing category names and hierarchy.
tooltips.orderView: Allows viewing all customer orders and timelines.
tooltips.orderEdit: Allows updating order statuses, assignments, and notes.
tooltips.inventoryView: Allows viewing inventory counts and locations.
tooltips.inventoryAudit: Allows recording inventory audits and stock corrections.
tooltips.reportsView: Allows accessing analytics dashboards and reports.
tooltips.reportsExport: Allows exporting reports and data extracts.
tooltips.userInvite: Allows inviting new users to the workspace.
tooltips.userSuspend: Allows suspending or reactivating user accounts.
